list_definition.definition: to decorate with designs in needlework

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She embroidered her name on her handkerchief

list_ex_of_english: When a little girl asks him to stand on his head, he throws up on her dress embroidered with gold.
He wore silk boots embroidered with gold, and a sash of blue girded his waist.
The student's name, number, and name of the school are often embroidered on the blouse or shirt.
Most of the decorations are embroidered, flowers and regional animals are among the most common designs found in polleras.
Over him was spread a rich, dyed samite cloth, embroidered with many golden flowers, and before him burned a single candle, no more, no less.
The costume includes white sari embroidered with bright golden brocade (known as kasavu) at the edges.
In addition, heralds and pursuivants wear black velvet caps with a badge embroidered.
